name: IconListPanelette

properties.name: rows
properties.description: A collection of two-member arrays describing the rows to display in the panelette.
properties.longdesc:
Each member of the member arrays corresponds to a column.
				 The first member of each member array specifies the icon displayed in the first column, as a Thumbnail Object or a 16x16 pixel JPG, PNG, or system icon.
				 The second member, displayed in the second column, is a string that can contain markup elements to access dynamic data.

properties.name: titleMarkup
properties.description: Localizable text shown in the subpanel header bar.
properties.longdesc: Can include panelette markup elements. If not supplied, the name string appears as the  header.

properties.name: name
properties.description: The unique, identifying name of this subpanel.

description: Represents a member subpanel of an InspectorPanel object that displays two columns for an icon and text.
longdesc: The text can be static, or can be obtained dynamically from the associated thumbnail at display time, using panelette markup syntax.
